00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Dialogs {
00035     public class Login : Niry.GUI.Gtk2.LoginDialog {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Events
00038         // ============================================
00039 
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PROTECTED Members
00042         // ============================================
00043         protected Gtk.CheckButton checkSecureAuth;
00044         protected LoginDialog.MenuManager menuManager;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PRIVATE Members
00048         // ============================================
00049         private Gtk.HBox hboxMenu;
00050 
00051         // ============================================
00052         // PUBLIC Constructors
00053         // ============================================
00055         public Login() {
00056             Resizable = false;
00057             SetDefaultSize(240, 355);
00058             DefaultIcon = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("NyFolderIcon");
00059 
00060             // Initialize Dialog Options
00061             Title = Info.Name + " Login";
00062             Logo = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("NyFolderLogo", 240, 140);
00063 
00064             // Initialize Menu Manager
00065             this.menuManager = new LoginDialog.MenuManager();
00066 
00067             // Initialize Menu's HBox
00068             this.hboxMenu = new Gtk.HBox(false, 0);
00069             VBox.PackStart(this.hboxMenu, false, false, 0);
00070             this.VBox.ReorderChild(this.hboxMenu, 0);
00071 
00073             this.hboxMenu.PackStart(this.MenuBar, false, false, 0);
00074             this.menuManager.Activated += new EventHandler(OnMenuActivated);
00075             this.AddAccelGroup(this.menuManager.AccelGroup);
00076 
00077             // Remember Password (CheckButton)
00078             checkRememberPassword.Image = new Gtk.Image(Stock.Save, IconSize.Button);
00079 
00080             // Secure Authentication (CheckButton)
00081             checkSecureAuth = new CheckButton("Use Secure Authentication");
00082             checkSecureAuth.Active = true;
00083             checkSecureAuth.Image = StockIcons.GetImage("Lock", 22);
00084             checkSecureAuth.Toggled += new EventHandler(OnCheckSecureAuthToggled);
00085             VBox.PackStart(checkSecureAuth, false, false, 2);
00086 
00087             // Initialize Dialog Buttons
00088             AddButton(Gtk.Stock.Ok, ResponseType.Ok);
00089             AddButton(Gtk.Stock.Quit, ResponseType.Close);
00090 
00091             ShowAll();
00092         }
00093 
00094         // ============================================
00095         // PUBLIC Methods
00096         // ============================================
00098         public bool ValidateInput() {
00099             // Check NULL Username
00100             if (TextUtils.IsEmpty(Username)) {
00101                 string title = "Invalid UserName";
00102                 string message = "Please Set Your UserName, Null Username Found";
00103                 ShowErrorMessage(title, message);
00104                 return(false);
00105             }
00106 
00107             // If Insecure Authentication Mode Return Input OK
00108             if (SecureAuthentication == false)
00109                 return(true);
00110 
00111             // Check NULL Password
00112             if (TextUtils.IsEmpty(Password)) {
00113                 string title = "Invalid Password";
00114                 string message = "Please Set Your Password, Null Password Found";
00115                 ShowErrorMessage(title, message);
00116                 return(false);
00117             }
00118 
00119             return(true);
00120         }
00121 
00123         public UserInfo CheckLogin() {
00124             MyInfo.Initialize(Username, SecureAuthentication);
00125 
00126             if (SecureAuthentication == false)
00127                 return(MyInfo.GetInstance());
00128 
00129             // Login Progress Dialog
00130             LoginDialog.ProgressDialog dialog = new LoginDialog.ProgressDialog(Password);
00131             ResponseType response = (ResponseType) dialog.Run();
00132             string responseMsg = dialog.ResponseMessage;
00133             dialog.Destroy();
00134 
00135             // Login OK
00136             if (response == ResponseType.Ok)
00137                 return(MyInfo.GetInstance());
00138 
00139             string title = "Login Error";
00140             if (responseMsg == null) responseMsg = "Unknown Error...";
00141             ShowErrorMessage(title, responseMsg);
00142             return(null);
00143         }
00144 
00145         // ============================================
00146         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00147         // ============================================
00148         private void OnMenuActivated (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00149             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00150                 Action action = sender as Action;
00151                 switch (action.Name) {
00152                     // File Menu
00153                     case "ProxySettings":
00154                         Glue.Dialogs.ProxySettings();
00155                         break;
00156                     case "Quit":
00157                         Gtk.Application.Quit();
00158                         break;
00159                     // Help Menu
00160                     case "About":
00161                         new Dialogs.About();
00162                         break;
00163                 }
00164             });
00165         }
00166 
00167         private void OnCheckSecureAuthToggled (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00168             CheckButton checkButton = sender as CheckButton;
00169             this.labelPassword.Sensitive = checkButton.Active;
00170             this.entryPassword.Sensitive = checkButton.Active;
00171             this.checkRememberPassword.Sensitive = checkButton.Active;
00172         }
00173 
00174         // ============================================
00175         // PRIVATE Methods
00176         // ============================================
00177         private void ShowErrorMessage (string title, string message) {
00178             WindowUtils.Shake(this, 2);
00179             Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title, message);
00180         }
00181 
00182         // ============================================
00183         // PUBLIC Properties
00184         // ============================================
00186         public bool SecureAuthentication {
00187             set { checkSecureAuth.Active = value; }
00188             get { return(checkSecureAuth.Active); }
00189         }
00190 
00192         public LoginDialog.MenuManager Menu {
00193             get { return(this.menuManager); }
00194         }
00195 
00197         public Gtk.MenuBar MenuBar {
00198             get { return((Gtk.MenuBar) this.menuManager.GetWidget("/MenuBar")); }
00199         }
00200 
00202         public Gtk.HBox MenuBarHBox {
00203             get { return(this.hboxMenu); }
00204         }
00205     }
00206 }
